channel.title: Sharing Economy on Ex Machina
channel.description: Recent content in Sharing Economy on Ex Machina

item.title: From Ownership to Access
item.description: We have grown accustomed to constant consumption that has been made possible by planned obsolescence. But new technologies have made it possible for us to make the shift from ownership to access. Will this reverse the trend of constant consumption?

item.title: Trusting the Sharing Economy
item.description: On-demand services that comprise the sharing economy are superior to their real world counterparts because of the dual feedback system. Trust identity based on dual feedback loops could create the civilised commercial ecosystem that has always been the ultimate objective of putting in place a regulatory framework.
